title: Guest in the House (1944 film noir) starring Anne Baxter | Directed by John Brahm

sources.title: Guest in the House (1944 film noir) starring Anne Baxter | Directed by John Brahm
sources.description:
Martha Proctor (Aline MacMahon) feels that something sinister has come to her home when her nephew, Dr. Dan Proctor (Scott McKay), arrives with his frail fiancée, Evelyn Heath (Anne Baxter). Tensions rise as Evelyn, hiding her true intentions, begins to manipulate those around her, particularly her future brother-in-law, Douglas (Ralph Bellamy). As Evelyn’s behavior creates conflict between the Proctor family members, secrets begin to unravel, and suspicions grow. With the atmosphere growing increasingly tense, it’s unclear just how far Evelyn is willing to go to achieve her desires—until an unexpected turn leaves the household on the brink of disaster.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/C0Zr6PMjDBU


Directors: John Brahm, Lewis Milestone,
Writers: Ketti Frings, Hagar Wilde 
Stars: Anne Baxter, Ralph Bellamy, Aline MacMahon
Genres: Classics, Drama, Film-Noir


@CultCinemaClassics  

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZ0h0ouY9tWI-vfLlRO1Nt2
